name: Switch (itch) (5TEV3N)
description:
This is a game made for a GameJam that was hosted at my school. The theme was a "Worldless World". I was scavenging around for ideas and finally settled for a simple puzzle game.

The rules of the GameJam consisted of making the game under 2 days and that there will be no use of letters, words,or keyboard symbols so I tried my best to convey the rules of my game the best I could.

Enjoy!

Thanks Robinhood76 for the cool sound!
